name: Operation Mongoose
description:
Operation Mongoose

It's 1961 and it is your mission to locate and neutralize all hostile launch sites in Cuba! We must secure all locations to prevent all-out nuclear war. we have very little resources at our disposal so you must act and make tactical choices wisely 

You are the pilot of a U2 high altitude spy aircraft, it is your mission to locate, and neutralize all high-value targets.

Be aware. any direct hostility to buildings or civilians will have negative conequences.

HTML5 Version may have quite a few bugs....because of HTML5. For the best experience download the windows file, extract the folder, and play the .exe inside!
